news.content: When diabetics were questioned about the kind of exercise regime they follow, almost 60% of them answered walking. And this is a common belief not only in our country but worldwide. Diabetics are often recommended to walk for a minimum of 45 minutes and pract… [+3998 chars]

news.description: Religion in different forms has largely co-existed with science, with both domains contributing equally to our worldview.

news.title: Bill and Melinda Gates to divorce after 27 years together - Aljazeera.com

news.title: ‘Herd immunity’ looking unlikely in US, report says - Fox News
news.author: Edmund DeMarche
news.description: There is a growing belief among scientists that the U.S. will not achieve ‘herd immunity’ when it comes to the coronavirus and there will be new flare-ups for the foreseeable future, but becoming less of a threat to the public.

news.title: World Business Watch: Tesla under scrutiny in China, steps up engagement with regulators | Elon Musk - WION
La confianza del consumidor sube en abril, pero no recupera el nivel precovid - MurciaEconomía.com
基金圈唯一“网红”首席杨德龙眼中的A股市场价值投资真谛-手机金融界 - 金融界
news.description:
周四沪深两市出现了震荡调整，特别是创业板指数，调整幅度比较大。同时，今天也是五一小长假节后的第一个交易日，由于节假日期间，外围市场出现了普遍的调整，特别是港股的调整幅度较大，导致A股在开盘之后出现低开，进而震荡。 
　　从行业板块来看，新能源板块表现相对强势，而中小板块表现则比较弱，出现了大幅的调整。市场的结构性行情已经展开，只是大盘从前期的单边下跌阶段进
